introduction: New Space Adventures will closely explore several of the greatest mysteries in space.. From planets and moons, to deep space, New Space Adventures will bring viewers further than ever before into the great unknown! New information, along with interviews from experts, will both entertain and amaze. What discoveries are new in space? New Space Adventures will answer this question and many more!1. Jupiter2. Europa3. Mars Part I4. Mars Part II5. Asteroids and CometsNarrator: Leonard PayneProduction: Digital Founder Group L.L.C., Thru the Roof Productions
